rooms.description: A spacious hall that follows Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow. It includes a traditional Kerala-style entrance with decorative wooden panels.
Open-plan living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation, designed according to Vastu principles ensuring proper alignment with cardinal directions.
Adjacent to the living room, this area is designed for family meals and gatherings, ensuring clear view of the entrance as per Vastu guidelines.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with modern amenities integrated into the design. Open concept for ventilation and light, aligned as per Vastu recommendations.
A guest bedroom designed for comfort with ample storage and traditional Kerala elements, ensuring the occupant's well-being as per Vastu guidelines.
The primary bedroom offering privacy and comfort. The room is oriented in a direction favorable to Vastu principles ensuring energy flow for the head of the household.
A well-ventilated bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with fixtures placed according to Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated living space for servants, integrated within the ground floor layout ensuring ease of access and privacy while aligning with Vastu.

openings.description: Entry point designed to welcome positive energy. Placed in the auspicious direction as per Vastu.
Large windows ensuring natural light and proper ventilation while following traditional design aesthetics.
Window placed to ensure adequate ventilation in the kitchen, adhering to Vastu principles.
Small windows for privacy and light, maintaining harmony with traditional Kerala design.
